name: Disrupting Cultural PsyOps
description: Neutralizing mass programming tactics used in global media, music, and art.

cards.title: Deconstructing Manufactured Idols and Influencers
cards.description: Revealing how entertainment and social media figures are used as cultural control agents.
bulletpoints: Identifying industry-backed influencers with hidden agendas.
Understanding how pop culture figures influence political and social beliefs.
Tracing the ties between media elites and intelligence agencies.

cards.title: Cultural Warfare Through Music and Sound Frequencies
cards.description: Examining how music and sound frequencies manipulate emotions and consciousness.
bulletpoints: Understanding frequency manipulation in pop music and entertainment.
Examining historical shifts in musical tuning standards and their effects.
Using sound as a counter-tool for cognitive and emotional resilience.

cards.title: Counteracting Ideological Subversion in Art and Literature
cards.description: Exposing how books, films, and art are weaponized to reinforce control systems.
bulletpoints: Recognizing ideological programming in best-selling books and media franchises.
Identifying state-funded cultural movements designed to reshape public thought.
Techniques to create counter-narratives and independent storytelling.
